metadata.description: Enhanced smart product catalog with AI-friendly structure

ready_to_use_chemicals.name: Ready To Use Cleaning Products
ready_to_use_chemicals.description: Pre-made cleaning solutions ready to use immediately

products.name: LUXELINEN - FABRIC CONDITIONER
products.description: Premium fabric conditioner for ultra-soft, fresh-smelling clothes
benefits: Works in machine and hand wash
how_to_use: Washing machine: Add 30ml (1 cap) to rinse cycle
Hand wash: Add 1 cap to 5 liters of water during final rinse
Do not pour directly on clothes

common_questions.question: How much should I use?
common_questions.answer: Use 30ml (1 cap) for one washing machine load. For hand wash, use 1 cap in 5 liters of water.

common_questions.question: Is it safe for baby clothes?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Completely safe for baby clothes and suitable for sensitive skin.

common_questions.question: Does it work with hand wash?
common_questions.answer: Absolutely! Add 1 cap to 5 liters of water during the final rinse.

products.name: SILKYSHINE - ULTRA - LIQUID DETERGENT
products.description: Ultra-concentrated liquid detergent for brilliant cleaning and shine
products.short_description: Premium liquid detergent with shine enhancer
uses: Machine washing - front and top load
how_to_use: Machine wash: 40ml for medium load, 60ml for heavy load
Hand wash: 20ml for 5 liters of water
For tough stains: Apply directly and wait 5 minutes before washing

common_questions.question: What's the difference between Ultra and Smart?
common_questions.answer: Ultra is our premium formula with higher concentration and better stain removal. Smart is economical but still very effective.

common_questions.question: Can I use it for whites?
common_questions.answer: Yes! It's excellent for whites and maintains brightness without yellowing.

products.name: GLEAM DROP - ULTRA - DISH WASH
products.description: Ultra-powerful dishwashing liquid that cuts through grease instantly
products.short_description: Premium dish wash with superior grease-cutting power
uses: Cleans all types of dishes and utensils
Removes tough grease from pots and pans
benefits: Removes 99% of grease in one wash
how_to_use: Add 5-10ml to sink full of water
For tough grease: Apply directly on utensil, wait 2 minutes, then scrub
Rinse thoroughly with clean water
not_recommended_for: Use with hot water above 60┬░C may reduce fragrance

common_questions.question: Is it safe for hands?
common_questions.answer: Yes, it's gentle on hands. However, we recommend gloves for prolonged use or if you have sensitive skin.

common_questions.question: How much should I use?
common_questions.answer: Just 5-10ml (about 1-2 drops) is enough for a full sink of dishes. It's very concentrated!

common_questions.question: Does it work on burnt vessels?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Apply directly on burnt area, let it sit for 5 minutes, then scrub. Works like magic!

products.name: MOP FRESH - ULTRA - FLOOR CLEANER
products.description: Ultra-powerful floor cleaning solution for all floor types
products.short_description: Premium floor cleaner with long-lasting freshness
uses: All types of floors - tiles, marble, granite, ceramic
how_to_use: Mix 50ml (2 caps) in 5 liters of water
Mop floor with solution
No need to rinse - let it dry naturally
For tough stains: Use undiluted and scrub

common_questions.question: Can I use it on marble floors?
common_questions.answer: Yes! It's safe for marble, granite, tiles, ceramic - all floor types.

common_questions.question: Does it kill germs?
common_questions.answer: Yes, it disinfects and kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria.

common_questions.question: Will it leave my floor sticky?
common_questions.answer: No! It leaves no sticky residue. Your floors will be clean and dry.

products.name: SHINE BOWL - TOILET BOWL CLEANER
products.description: Powerful toilet bowl cleaner that removes stains and kills germs
benefits: Thick gel formula - clings to bowl
how_to_use: Apply around toilet bowl rim
Let it sit for 10-15 minutes
Scrub with toilet brush
Flush to rinse

products.name: DEEP ZAP - STAIN REMOVER
products.description: Powerful stain remover for tough stains on clothes and fabrics
uses: Works on ink, blood, food stains
Safe for colored and white fabrics
how_to_use: Apply directly on stain
Wait 5-10 minutes
Wash normally with detergent

chemical_raw_materials.name: Chemical Raw Materials
chemical_raw_materials.description: Essential raw materials for manufacturing cleaning products

products.name: ACETIC ACID - KG
products.description: High-quality acetic acid for cleaning product manufacturing

common_questions.question: What can I make with acetic acid?
common_questions.answer: You can make floor cleaners, glass cleaners, toilet bowl cleaners, and descaling solutions.

common_questions.question: Is it safe to handle?
common_questions.answer: It's corrosive, so always wear gloves and avoid skin contact. Handle with care.

products.name: LABSA (SLURRY) - ACID SLURRY
products.description: Linear Alkyl Benzene Sulfonic Acid - Essential surfactant for detergent manufacturing

products.name: SLES PASTE - 70%
products.description: Sodium Lauryl Ether Sulfate - Premium surfactant for gentle cleaning products

cleaning_accessories.name: Cleaning Accessories & Tools
cleaning_accessories.description: Essential tools and accessories for effective cleaning

products.name: ALFA FLOOR WIPER 21 INCH
products.description: Heavy-duty 21-inch floor wiper for large area cleaning

products.name: NORMAL WOOLED DRY MOP SET 24 INCH
products.description: Complete 24-inch dry mop set for dust-free floor cleaning
